resources.string: Liberario\nÂ© 2013 Torsten Grote\nFree Software License: GPLv3

Liberario is a public transport app which you can freely use, study, share and improve.

Attention: This is still alpha software. It has many bugs and a lot of functionality is still missing.

Contributions are encouraged and appreciated. If you like to contribute please go to github for more information.
